entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.5°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3 except plus 4 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except plus 4 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
